headline: Is PepsiCo Still a Refreshing Buy?
summary: The board of directors recently increased the dividend by 5%.  PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) has become a household name.  In the case of PepsiCo, the stock has fallen about 23% over the last year through June 3.
